name: Snowball's Chance (clumsytank)
description:
Snowball's Chance

An arcade-style on-rails flight game where you play as a snowball ascending out of an infernal dimension, avoiding obstacles along the way.

This game was developed for the Game Off 2022 game jam hosted by GitHub. It's based on the cliché "(a) snowball's chance in hell".

Built using Three.js, React, TypeScript, and Vite.

Asset Credits Music

"Dear Mr Super Computer " by HoliznaCC0 - Distributed via Free Music Archive
